comment.author: 8059137@N06
comment._content: Couldn't understand a word from your description, but the photo looks really nice. Is that you who took that picture?

comment.author: 29998366@N02
comment._content: The name of the photographer is Antonisse. The picture belongs to the collection of the Dutch press agency Anefo. The Anefo collection is held by the Nationaal Archief, the National Archives of the Netherlands. We are asking people to enrich the photos, so please leave a comment if you have additional information.

comment.author: 34453907@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Snow Plows and Snow Removal Equipment, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
